name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2015
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2015年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Primary aluminum ingot casting is an industrial process used for producing pure aluminum ingots. These ingots serve as a key raw material for a wide range of applications in industries such as automotive, aerospace, construction, and electronics. The aluminum is typically cast from its liquid state into standardized shapes for further processing or direct use in product manufacturing.
原生铝锭铸造是生产纯铝锭的工业过程。这些铝锭是汽车、航空航天、建筑和电子等多种行业应用中关键的原材料。通常将液态铝铸造成标准化形状，用于进一步加工或直接用于产品制造。

technology.technologicalApplicability: Primary aluminum ingot casting is an industrial process used for producing pure aluminum ingots. These ingots serve as a key raw material for a wide range of applications in industries such as automotive, aerospace, construction, and electronics. The aluminum is typically cast from its liquid state into standardized shapes for further processing or direct use in product manufacturing.
原生铝锭铸造是生产纯铝锭的工业过程。这些铝锭是汽车、航空航天、建筑和电子等多种行业应用中关键的原材料。通常将液态铝铸造成标准化形状，用于进一步加工或直接用于产品制造。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The data set referring to the LCA data of primary aluminum ingot casting from 2015 should be used with consideration of its temporal relevance and geographical specificity. Users should note that the primary aluminum (PA) data were obtained from statistical sources, while the secondary aluminum (SA) data were derived from literature. When applying this data, attention should be given to the background data's source, the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018 by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences. Adjustments may be required for LCA studies focusing on different regions or time periods. Methodological considerations, such as the inclusion or exclusion of recycling processes, should align with the goal and scope of the assessment.

该数据集涉及至2015年的原生铝锭铸造的LCA数据，使用时应考虑其时间相关性和地理特异性。用户应注意，原生铝（PA）数据来自统计资料，而次生铝（SA）数据主要来自文献。在应用这些数据时，需要关注背景数据来源——中国科学院生态环境研究中心建立的中国本土化LCA数据库CAS RCEES 2018。如果进行不同地区或不同时间段的LCA研究可能需要进行调整。方法论方面的考量，比如是否纳入回收过程，应与评估的目标和范围保持一致。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
